    • Method Detail

      • getSeries

        public java.util.List<Series> getSeries(User user,
                               java.lang.Boolean seen)
        Retrieves a list of series the user has stored, or a list of all users series if the user is admin.
        Parameters:
        user - User, whose series are retrieved. If user is admin (User.isAdmin() returns true) all users' series are retrieved.
        seen - Retrieves only series with the same value on seen. If parameter is null it is ignored.
        Returns:
        A list of series, or null if the database query fails.

      • getByName

        public java.util.List<Series> getByName(User user,
                               java.lang.String search,
                               java.lang.Boolean seen)
        Retrieves a list of the user's series with a name corresponding to the search term, or a list of all users series if the user is admin.
        Parameters:
        user - User, whose series are retrieved. If user is admin (User.isAdmin() returns true) all users series are retrieved.
        search - Search term, which is compared to series names. If the search term consists of many words (separated by white spaces) all the search terms are matches (by AND).
        seen - Retrieves only series with the same value on seen. If parameter is null it is ignored.
        Returns:
        A list of series, or null if the database query fails.

      • getByGenre

        public java.util.List<Series> getByGenre(User user,
                                java.lang.String search,
                                java.lang.Boolean seen)
        Retrieves a list of the user's series with a genre corresponding to the search term, or a list of all users series if the user is admin.
        Parameters:
        user - User, whose series are retrieved. If user is admin (User.isAdmin() returns true) all users series are retrieved.
        search - Search term, which is compared to series genres.
        seen - Retrieves only series with the same value on seen. If parameter is null it is ignored.
        Returns:
        A list of series, or null if the database query fails.

      • getByMediaFormat

        public java.util.List<Series> getByMediaFormat(User user,
                                      java.lang.String mediaformat,
                                      java.lang.Boolean seen)
        Retrieves a list of the user's series with a media format corresponding to the search term, or a list of all users series if the user is admin.
        Parameters:
        user - User, whose series are retrieved. If user is admin (User.isAdmin() returns true) all users series are retrieved.
        mediaformat - Search term, which is compared to series' media formats.
        seen - Retrieves only series with the same value on seen. If parameter is null it is ignored.
        Returns:
        A list of series, or null if the database query fails.

      • addSeries

        public boolean addSeries(User user,
                Series series)
        Adds a series to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - The series' owner.
        series - Series to be stored.
        Returns:
        true if series was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • removeSeries

        public boolean removeSeries(int seriesid)
        Permanently deletes the series with the given seriesid from the database.
        Parameters:
        seriesid - Id of the series.
        Returns:
        true if information was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • getAllEpisodes

        public java.util.List<Episode> getAllEpisodes(int seriesid)
        Retrieves all episodes to the series with the given seriesid from the database.
        Parameters:
        seriesid - Id of the series.
        Returns:
        A list of episodes, or null if the database query fails.

      • getById

        public Series getById(int seriesid)
        Retrieves the series with the given seriesid from the database.
        Parameters:
        seriesid - Id of the series.
        Returns:
        Series, or null if the database query fails.

      • updateNames

        public boolean updateNames(Series series,
                  java.util.Map<LangId,java.lang.String> names)
        Updates the names of the series.
        Parameters:
        series - Series to be updated.
        names - Map containing the new name values.
        Returns:
        true if information was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • updateGenres

        public boolean updateGenres(Series series,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> genreList)
        Updates the genres of the series.
        Parameters:
        series - Series to be updated.
        genreList - List containing the new genre values.
        Returns:
        true if information was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • addNewSeason

        public boolean addNewSeason(int seriesid,
                   int seasonNumber,
                   int nrOfEpisodes,
                   boolean seen,
                   Format format)
        Adds a new season to the series to the database.
        Parameters:
        seriesid - Id of the series.
        seasonNumber - Number of the season to be added.
        nrOfEpisodes - Number of episodes in the season.
        seen - Default value of the seen variable for the episodes in the new season.
        format - Format of the season.
        Returns:
        true if information was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • addNewSeason

        public boolean addNewSeason(int seriesid,
                   int seasonNumber,
                   int nrOfEpisodes,
                   boolean seen,
                   java.lang.Integer year,
                   Format format)
        Adds a new season to the series to the database.
        Parameters:
        seriesid - Id of the series.
        seasonNumber - Number of the season to be added.
        nrOfEpisodes - Number of episodes in the season.
        seen - Default value of the seen variable for the episodes in the new season.
        year - Default value of the year variable for the episodes in the new season.
        format - Format of the season.
        Returns:
        true if information was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • updateEpisode

        public boolean updateEpisode(Episode episode)
        Updates the information of an episode.
        Parameters:
        episode - Episode to be updated, containing all info to be stored in the database.
        Returns:
        true if information was successfully added, otherwise false.

      • removeSeason

        public boolean removeSeason(int seriesid,
                   int seasonnumber)
        Permanently deletes the specified season from the database.
        Parameters:
        seriesid - Id of the series.
        seasonnumber - Number of the season to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if information was successfully added, otherwise false.
